title: Google Maps Extractor
description: Extract data from thousands of Google Maps locations and businesses. Our base charge for Google Maps is just $4 per 1,000 places.

zoom.description: Higher zoom extracts more places but takes exponentially longer. Default zoom is automatically chosen based on location size.

includeReviews.description: Extract customer reviews for each place (additional cost - marked with $ sign)
